(I) < MNP

(ii) < POQ

answer:
(a)

(i) <MPQ = 90\(^o\) (Angle in a semi circle) 

< NPQ = 180\(^o\) - 50\(^o\) = 130\(^o\)

< MNP = 130\(^o\) - 90\(^o\) = 40\(^o\)

< NMP = 40\(^o\) (Isolceles triangle) 

< MNP = 180\(^o\) - (40\(^o\) + 40\(^o\))

= 180\(^o\) - 80\(^o\) = 100\(^o\)

 

(ii) < OPQ = 90\(^o\)(50\(^o\) - 40\(^o\)) = 80\(^o\)

< OPQ = 80\(^o\) (Isoseles triangle) 

< POQ = 180\(^o\) (80\(^o\) + 80\(^o\))

180\(^o\) - 160\(^o\) = 20\(^o\) 

 

(b) 8y + 4x = 24

y = \(\frac{-1}{2}x + 6\)
